column4: does open office have an image editor .. i remember using something or does draw rotate the image of a page i scanned and let me change it?
I think draw is it, but I have no experience with it
could i use something else in xsane for that?
you can try #users.openoffice.org   But why not use the GIMP to edit the image?
the GIMP would probably do if i have enough ram in this computer, i've never done anything so it's all new to me
here, just ask a detailed question
unzip helpfiles.zip   (or just double click on it)
i dont see any bugs like 'update caused sysemt to crash' but it happened to her. She opened update manager and downloaded/installed like that
I'm pretty sure that if you try to close a window for an unsaved document oo will tell you
use xkill if you want to just click and kill
